head.supplied: 6/1/65. ¶ ¶ Allow me, dear Doctor Eades, to ask, whether any probability exists of a little fund being spent on the formation of walks through the reserve near the Cricketground. The new garden bridg...

div.p: No. 472, unit 732, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Allow me, dear Doctor Eades, to ask, whether any probability exists of a little fund being spent on the formation of walks through the reserve near the Cricketground. The new garden bridge is expected to be completed within a few months and it would be well if by that time the various paths were also formed. With my cordial wishes for your health and prosperity in the new year I remain, dear friend, your attached

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
